summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CompassX CRM updates including login, dashboard permissions, My Pipeline functionality, delete operations, and owner assignment features

integration_issues.issue: JWT tokens have short expiration causing frequent logouts during extended use

passed_tests: Dashboard includes owner names from users array
My Pipeline shows only user-owned opportunities via /api/dashboard/my-pipeline
Delete functionality for organizations, contacts, opportunities
New opportunity creation assigns current user as owner
Full pipeline shows all opportunities with owner information
Dashboard displays owner information (5 'Owner:' labels found)
My Pipeline page navigation with user-specific badge
Create opportunity button with correct data-testid
